event.descr:
A fault occured with the following attributes: ovnFaultTrapSeverity: The severity of the fault. See FaultSeverity ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION for all possible values. ovnFaultTrapSlot: the slot number where the fault occured. See FaultSlotType ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION for all possible values. ovnFaultTrapDevice: the device the fault occured on. See FaultDeviceType ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION for all possible values. ovnFaultTrapId: the id of the fault. See FaultIdType ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION for all possible values. ovnFaultTrapTimeStamp: the time the fault occured. ovnFaultTrapSequenceTag: a unigue tag for each fault. ifIndex: the interface the fault occured on. Only applicaple for interface specific faults. Will be 0 for non interface specific faults. ovnFaultTrapCPType = CircuitPackType. For main board faults the setting will be ovnISGMainBoard. ovnFaultChannel: the channel of the fault. Only applicaple for channelized cards. For non channelized cards the value will be noChan. See FaultChannelType ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION for all possible values.

ovnFaultTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

minor(10) major(11) critical(12) unknown(85)

ovnFaultTrapSlot %parm[#2]%;

mainBoard(1) slot1(2) slot2(3) slot3(4) slot4(5) unknown(85)

ovnFaultTrapDevice %parm[#3]%;

slot(1) port1(2) port2(3) port3(4) port4(5) port5(6) port6(7) port7(8) port8(9) fan0(10) fan1(11) fan2(12) fan3(13) facet(14) power0(15) power1(16) volts48V0(17) volts48V1(18) rdram(19) aux(20) bits1(21) bits2(22) pom(23) compactFlash(24) primaryPartition(25) secondaryPartition(26) fpga(27) volts12V0(28) volts12V1(29) syslog(30) login(31) nvram(32) fan4(33) power2(34) volts48V2(35) volts12V2(36) system(37) unknown(85)

ovnFaultTrapId %parm[#4]%;

fan0(1) fan1(2) fan2(3) fan3(4) iqauditFacet(5) pomFacet(6) powerOvertemp(7) powerFailure(8) parity(9) rw(10) pomDisabled(11) warmSwap(12) rootPartition(13) kernelFailure(14) applicationFailure(15) remoteFailures(16) los(17) yellow(18) red(19) ais(20) lof(21) netRed(22) netYel(23) netLops(24) clkLos(25) netLos(26) netAis(27) clocking(28) secLos(29) secLof(30) lineAis(31) lineRdi(32) pathAis(33) pathLop(34) pathRdi(35) j0Mis(36) slotMismatch(37) rbrFailure(38) loopDetect(39) linkFail(40) fpgadownloadFail(41) linkHung(42) logPushFailed(43) invalidCardRemoval(44) failedLogInAttempt(45) psrMultipleArbiters(46) apsFailure(47) apsBackupFailure(48) lom(49) configCorrupt(50) defaultPasswords(51) fan4(52) psrFailure(53) bundleDegrade(54) duplicateHostBuffer(55) bufferPoolAuditFailed(56) outOfBuffers(57) unknown(85)

ovnFaultTrapTimeStamp %parm[#5]%;

ovnFaultTrapSequenceTag %parm[#6]%;

ifIndex %parm[#7]%;

ovnFaultTrapCPType %parm[#8]%;

unknown(-1) ovnISGGigEther(1) ovnISGOc12(2) ovnISGOc3(3) ovnISGT1Cem(4) ovnISGE1Cem(5) ovnISGDs3(6) ovnISGT1Packet(7) ovnISG100FX(8) ovnISGDs3TDM(9) ovnISGNxT1(10) ovnISGFXTXCombo(11) ovnISGOctalEther(12) ovnISGOctalFib(13) ovnISGGigSfp(14) ovnISGOctalEther4Port(15) ovnISGNxE1(16) ovnISGT1TwoPort(17) ovnISGT1FourPort(18) ovnISGE1TwoPort(19) ovnISGE1FourPort(20) ovnISGNxDS3(21) ovnISGE1Packet(22) ovnISGChanDs3(23) ovnISGOc12GFP(24) ovnISGOc3GFP(25) ovnISGDualGig(26) ovnISGMainBoard(99)

ovnFaultTrapChannel %parm[#9]%;

noChan(0) chan1(1) chan2(2) chan3(3) chan4(4) chan5(5) chan6(6) chan7(7) chan8(8) chan9(9) chan10(10) chan11(11) chan12(12) chan13(13) chan14(14) chan15(15) chan16(16) chan17(17) chan18(18) chan19(19) chan20(20) chan21(21) chan22(22) chan23(23) chan24(24) chan25(25) chan26(26) chan27(27) chan28(28)
event.logmsg: ovnFaultActive trap received ovnFaultTrapSeverity=%parm[#1]% ovnFaultTrapSlot=%parm[#2]% ovnFaultTrapDevice=%parm[#3]% ovnFaultTrapId=%parm[#4]% ovnFaultTrapTimeStamp=%parm[#5]% ovnFaultTrapSequenceTag=%parm[#6]% ifIndex=%parm[#7]% ovnFaultTrapCPType=%parm[#8]% ovnFaultTrapChannel=%parm[#9]%

event.descr:
The Active Fault Cleared. All the attributes will contain the same information as what they were when the ovnFaultActive trap was sent. ovnFaultTrapSeverity: The severity of the fault. See FaultSeverity ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION for all possible values. ovnFaultTrapSlot: the slot number where the fault occured. See FaultSlotType ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION for all possible values. ovnFaultTrapDevice: the device the fault occured on. See FaultDeviceType ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION for all possible values. ovnFaultTrapId: the id of the fault. See FaultIdType ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION for all possible values. ovnFaultTrapTimeStamp: the time the fault occured. ovnFaultTrapSequenceTag: a unigue tag for each fault. Will match the tag generagted when the fault became active. ifIndex: the interface the fault occured on. Only applicaple for interface specific faults. Will be 0 for non interface specific faults. ovnFaultTrapCPType = CircuitPackType. For main board faults the setting will be ovnISGMainBoard. ovnFaultChannel: the channel of the fault. Only applicaple for channelized cards. For non channelized cards the value will be noChan.

ovnFaultTrapSeverity %parm[#1]%;

minor(10) major(11) critical(12) unknown(85)

ovnFaultTrapSlot %parm[#2]%;

mainBoard(1) slot1(2) slot2(3) slot3(4) slot4(5) unknown(85)

ovnFaultTrapDevice %parm[#3]%;

slot(1) port1(2) port2(3) port3(4) port4(5) port5(6) port6(7) port7(8) port8(9) fan0(10) fan1(11) fan2(12) fan3(13) facet(14) power0(15) power1(16) volts48V0(17) volts48V1(18) rdram(19) aux(20) bits1(21) bits2(22) pom(23) compactFlash(24) primaryPartition(25) secondaryPartition(26) fpga(27) volts12V0(28) volts12V1(29) syslog(30) login(31) nvram(32) fan4(33) power2(34) volts48V2(35) volts12V2(36) system(37) unknown(85)

ovnFaultTrapId %parm[#4]%;

fan0(1) fan1(2) fan2(3) fan3(4) iqauditFacet(5) pomFacet(6) powerOvertemp(7) powerFailure(8) parity(9) rw(10) pomDisabled(11) warmSwap(12) rootPartition(13) kernelFailure(14) applicationFailure(15) remoteFailures(16) los(17) yellow(18) red(19) ais(20) lof(21) netRed(22) netYel(23) netLops(24) clkLos(25) netLos(26) netAis(27) clocking(28) secLos(29) secLof(30) lineAis(31) lineRdi(32) pathAis(33) pathLop(34) pathRdi(35) j0Mis(36) slotMismatch(37) rbrFailure(38) loopDetect(39) linkFail(40) fpgadownloadFail(41) linkHung(42) logPushFailed(43) invalidCardRemoval(44) failedLogInAttempt(45) psrMultipleArbiters(46) apsFailure(47) apsBackupFailure(48) lom(49) configCorrupt(50) defaultPasswords(51) fan4(52) psrFailure(53) bundleDegrade(54) duplicateHostBuffer(55) bufferPoolAuditFailed(56) outOfBuffers(57) unknown(85)

ovnFaultTrapTimeStamp %parm[#5]%;

ovnFaultTrapSequenceTag %parm[#6]%;

ifIndex %parm[#7]%;

ovnFaultTrapCPType %parm[#8]%;

unknown(-1) ovnISGGigEther(1) ovnISGOc12(2) ovnISGOc3(3) ovnISGT1Cem(4) ovnISGE1Cem(5) ovnISGDs3(6) ovnISGT1Packet(7) ovnISG100FX(8) ovnISGDs3TDM(9) ovnISGNxT1(10) ovnISGFXTXCombo(11) ovnISGOctalEther(12) ovnISGOctalFib(13) ovnISGGigSfp(14) ovnISGOctalEther4Port(15) ovnISGNxE1(16) ovnISGT1TwoPort(17) ovnISGT1FourPort(18) ovnISGE1TwoPort(19) ovnISGE1FourPort(20) ovnISGNxDS3(21) ovnISGE1Packet(22) ovnISGChanDs3(23) ovnISGOc12GFP(24) ovnISGOc3GFP(25) ovnISGDualGig(26) ovnISGMainBoard(99)

ovnFaultTrapChannel %parm[#9]%;

noChan(0) chan1(1) chan2(2) chan3(3) chan4(4) chan5(5) chan6(6) chan7(7) chan8(8) chan9(9) chan10(10) chan11(11) chan12(12) chan13(13) chan14(14) chan15(15) chan16(16) chan17(17) chan18(18) chan19(19) chan20(20) chan21(21) chan22(22) chan23(23) chan24(24) chan25(25) chan26(26) chan27(27) chan28(28)
